title: League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro. The client will now exit. Please try restarting
body: Everytime i log on to play i can log in just fine but when i get in queue or just after a bit of time the game tells me i've lost contact with Maestro and exits league. This happens every single time i play, and i have been unable to play for at least 3 days now. I've run the Hextech Repair Tool and it tells me everything is working just fine, yet still i encounter the maestro problem. Can anyone help? (Running on 7.3.1)

replies.body: Getting the same error for the past two days.

This error can be caused by an unstable connection that's getting cutoff from the server or losing strength to tell the client that you're still online.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and fix any degradation with your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
